prodNameC: 邦迪斯人類抗心脂酵素免疫球蛋白M免疫分析套組
prodNameE: THE BINDING SITE BINDAZYMETM Human Anticardiolipin IgM Enzyme Immunoassay Kit
ingredientsDesc:
Instruction Leaflet: Giving full assay details.
QC Certificate: Indicating the expected performance of the batch.
Cardiolipin Coated Wells: 12 breakapart 8 well strips coated with bovine cardiolipin antigen.
Type II Sample Diluent: 2 bottles containing 50 ml of buffer for sample dilution.
Type II Wash Buffer (20x concentrate): 1 bottle containing 50 ml of a 20-fold concentrated buffer for washing the wells.
Cardiolipin IgM Calibrators: 5 bottles each containing 1.2 ml of diluted human serum, with the following concentrations of anticardiolipin autoantibody: 100, 50, 25, 12.5, 6.25 MPL U/ml.
Cardiolipin IgM Positive Control: 1 bottle containing 1.2 ml of diluted human serum. The expected value is given on the QC certificate.
Cardiolipin Negative Control: 1 bottle containing 1.2 ml of diluted human serum. The expected value is given on the QC certificate.
Cardiolipin IgM Conjugate: 1 bottle containing 12 ml of purified peroxidase labeled antibody.
TMB Substrate: 1 bottle containing 14 ml TMB substrate.
applicantName: 太暘生物科技股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 新北市汐止區康寧街169巷25號13樓
efficacy: 體外診斷血清中的抗牛心脂素免疫球蛋白M抗體，亦做為抗磷脂質(APS)診斷之輔助參考。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: C.5660 多發性自體抗體免疫試驗系統
